thread.title: Danielle Lloyd reveals she's 'too frightened to leave house' after receiving vile online abuse over Jamie O'Hara in CBB
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd reveals she's 'too frightened to leave house' after receiving vile online abuse over Jamie O'Hara in CBB

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Danielle Lloyd reveals she's 'too frightened to leave house' after receiving vile online abuse over Jamie O'Hara in CBB
text:
Celebs Danielle Lloyd reveals she's 'too frightened to leave house' after receiving vile online abuse over Jamie O'Hara in CBB The former WAG says old wounds have been opened and she's suffering from panic attacks since her ex went into the house Share Danielle Lloyd: I've been having panic attacks (Photo: Colin Lane/Channel 5) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Danielle Lloyd says she's suffering from panic attacks and is too scared to leave her home after receiving cruel online abuse over ex Jamie O'Hara who is currently in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
Speaking about the abuse she's received since the footballer entered the house and spilled details on their relationship, she says she has had to stop watching the Channel 5 show because it's caused her endless amounts of anxiety. 
During his time in the house, Jamie has moaned about about the amount he has to pay her in child maintenance and has also claimed she was demanding. 
Speaking about the backlash she's faced, the 33-year-old told The Sun on Sunday: "At first I replied to some of the comments about me being a gold digger to let people know it wasn’t true. But then I stopped because they just kept coming and getting worse. 2009: In happier times (Photo: WireImage) 
“Some are really vile, calling me a slag and all sorts of swear words. I’m suffering from panic attacks and now I only go out when I have to because I’m frightened someone will recognise me and have a go. 
“My chest feels really tight all the time because of the stress and anxiety and sometimes I can’t breathe." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
